title: Marek Dubeň
text:
Marek Dubeň (born 11 July 1994) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Nitra">Nitra</a>.
FC Nitra.
He made his professional debut for <a href="FC%20Nitra">Nitra</a> against <a href="FK%20Dukla%20Bansk%C3%A1%20Bystrica">Dukla Banská Bystrica</a>, entering in as a substitute in place of <a href="Henrich%20Ben%C4%8D%C3%ADk">Henrich Benčík</a> on 20 April 2013.
